thread.section_title: EMGA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EMGA | emga.co.uk
thread.title: Dave Long

author: Dave Long
title: Dave Long
text:
Prior to my lesson I was joking around that James would be in stiches watching my swing. How wrong I was. James is a great guy asked the right question about my game putting me at ease. By the end of the lesson Stance, Grip and swing were much better. Looking forward to my next lesson.
Another great thing, not once did he try to sell me new clubs or anything.
You want to improve have a lesson with James
